name: bignum
description: 128 and 256 bits integer and fixed point arithmetics. Also support checking overflow/underflow
author: MaxGraey <maxgraey@gmail.com>

scripts.build:test:u128: npx asc tests/assembly/u128.spec.as.ts -b tests/build/u128.wasm -t tests/build/u128.wat --validate --sourceMap --importMemory --debug --runtime stub
scripts.build:test:u256: npx asc tests/assembly/u256.spec.as.ts -b tests/build/u256.wasm -t tests/build/u256.wat --validate --sourceMap --importMemory --debug --runtime stub
scripts.build:test:safe_u128: npx asc tests/assembly/safe_u128.spec.as.ts -b tests/build/safe_u128.wasm -t tests/build/safe_u128.wat --validate --sourceMap --importMemory --debug --runtime stub
scripts.build:test: yarn build:test:u128 && yarn build:test:u256 && yarn build:test:safe_u128
